message: Let's split 70/30.  It's a good deal for you in the first round, Bob!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. How about a 60/40 split in your favor? This accounts for the time pressure.
Bob, time is running out!  This deal is still better than anything you'll get in later rounds.
Alice, I'm sticking to a fair deal. 55/45 reflects the decreasing value over time. Let's close this out.
Bob, I'm meeting you in the middle.  This is the last round I'm offering more than 55%!
